# Descripción del paquete

**crbiodiversity** es un paquete de R para buscar, descargar y visualizar datos de biodiversidad de Costa Rica.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("devtools")
```
:::


Cargar el paquete:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(devtools)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Loading required package: usethis
```
:::
:::


Luego proceder a instalar crgeo desde github:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
devtools::install_github("ManuelSpinola/crbiodiversity")
```
:::


y cargar el paquete:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(crbiodiversity)
```
:::


Además instalar estos otros paquetes:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
devtools::install_github("ManuelSpinola/crgeo")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Skipping install of 'crgeo' from a github remote, the SHA1 (fa77fe6e) has not changed since last install.
  Use `force = TRUE` to force installation
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
devtools::install_github("ManuelSpinola/crgrids")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Skipping install of 'crgrids' from a github remote, the SHA1 (91428f93) has not changed since last install.
  Use `force = TRUE` to force installation
```
:::
:::


Ejemplo del uso de crbiodiversity:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(spocc)
library(sf)
library(crgeo)
library(crgrids)
library(crbiodiversity)
```
:::


Buscar los registros del vampiro (Desmodus rotundus) con coordenadas geográficas para Costa Rica en los portales de datos [GBIF](https://www.gbif.org) e [iNaturalist](https://www.inaturalist.org/).


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
loc <- get_locations("Desmodus rotundus")
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(loc)
```
